mapper.insert: insert into video_favorites(id, video_id, folder_id, user_id, created_time, updated_time) values(#{id}, #{videoId}, #{folderId}, #{userId}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime})
mapper.delete: delete from video_favorites where video_id = #{videoId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select id, video_id as videoId, folder_id as folderId, user_id as userId, created_time as createdTime, updated_time as updatedTime from video_favorites where video_id = #{videoId} and user_id = #{userId}
